title: (x) Le Carrousel logo - Humanist 521 Cond {Yves}
content:
Hi Everydody,

Can someone tell me what is that fonts ?

Thanks

Marc C

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LogoLeCarrousel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191641/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoLeCarrousel.jpg) | 26.87 KB |
author: Marc C

comments.content: Humanist 521 is Bitstream's equivalent for Gill Sans, except that this specific weight doesn't exist as a Gill Sans cut.

Thank you very much Bald

Have a good day !
